channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Shared Files – Easy Download Manager and File Sharing Plugin with Frontend File Upload
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Shared Files – Easy Download Manager and File Sharing Plugin with Frontend File Upload

item.title: CVE-2021-24856|2024-08-03T19:42:17.305Z -- unknown -- shared%20files%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20download%20manager%20and%20file%20sharing%20plugin%20with%20frontend%20file%20upload
item.description: The Shared Files WordPress plugin before 1.6.61 does not sanitise and escape the Download Counter Text settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
